message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice. This ensures a fair distribution considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 60/40 is a more reasonable split considering the inflation.
Considering the inflation and aiming for an equitable distribution, I propose a 50/50 split. This ensures both parties receive equal value, despite the diminishing worth of money in future rounds.
